class.name: JavaScriptModule
class.brief_description: A JavaScript module resource for managing JavaScript source code and bytecode.
class.description: The JavaScriptModule class provides methods to manage JavaScript source code and bytecode. It allows you to get and set both the source code and bytecode of a JavaScript module.

method.name: get_bytecode
method.description: Returns the bytecode of the JavaScript module as a PackedByteArray.

method.name: get_source_code
method.description: Returns the source code of the JavaScript module as a String.

method.name: set_bytecode
method.description: Sets the bytecode of the JavaScript module using a PackedByteArray.

method.name: set_source_code
method.description: Sets the source code of the JavaScript module using a String.

members.member: The path to the JavaScript script file.
